name: The Village (itch) (adafish)
description:
A Ludum Dare 34 Game Jam game about going ham and growing your community. WASD/joystick to move, 'A'/left click to everything else. Programmer art and dialogue abounds.

Music is "Running Waters" by Jason Shaw.

Made in 72 hours by Jeffrey Harper and Ada Fisher.

Ludum Dare Entry
